statements: DELETE FROM employee_satisfaction_survey WHERE employee_id = 100 AND satisfaction_score > 8;

DELETE FROM employee_survey WHERE employee_id = 100 AND satisfaction_score > 4;

DELETE FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND first_name = 'John';
